OOC:

Can the prisioner speak or that tramp doesn't let them do that?



--=
--- Original Message ----- 
  From: CYBERWOLF4 
  To: nbwrpg@...=
m 
  Sent: Wednesday, June 06, 2001 10:46 AM
  Subject: Re: HAHAHAHAHAHAHAH=
AHA


  Ignatius stood up and stared at his statuesque prisoners. "Trainer =
circuitry" he commented "I'll bet you wish you had some." Like the overconf=
ident captor he gloated walking up, glareing eye to eye with Drillbit. It w=
as a bad mistake as the Predacons eyebeams fired. 

  "AHHHHH!!!" He yelled=
 as the bots eye beams took a chunk out of his left cheek. He recovered enr=
aged, he held his talons to the sides of Drillbits head. "How about if I re=
turn the favor?"

  Hallucinagens mindtricks came into play. In Ignatius' m=
ind he fired a missle at Drillbits head and missed, striking the coolant li=
ne to the main computer. without coolant the base would explode. "Look what=
 you made me do!!" he shouted continuously not knowing that the others coul=
dn't see a thing.


    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: Alloran2@ao=
l.com 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Tuesday, June 05, 2001 12:=
08 PM
    Subject: Re: HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA


    :::The Destrocons::: 

    =
::They would have screamed if they had the movement capacity to do so, but =

    since they didn't all three of their brains were drowned in a state of=
 fear 
    and confusion.  But soon anger started setting in.  All of them =
were thinking 
    that if they ever got out of this, the Trainers would di=
e slow and painful 
    deaths::
